 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:75523793</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Does Moldovan President Maia Sandu really want unification with Romania?]]></title>
  <updated>2026-01-15T19:04:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-01-15T19:04:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/does-moldovan-president-maia-sandu-really-want-unification-with-romania/a-75523793?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[Moldova's president Maia Sandu recently stated in a podcast that she would vote in favor of her country joining Romania in the event of a referendum. Her comments have caused outrage.]]></summary>
  <category term="NRS-Import"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:75525775</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Blankets, batteries, fires: How Kyiv is surviving icy winter]]></title>
  <updated>2026-01-15T18:26:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-01-15T18:26:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/blankets-batteries-fires-how-kyiv-is-surviving-icy-winter/a-75525775?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[Russia has deliberately attacked Ukraine's energy grid, as sub-zero temperatures take hold. Many are without power, heating or water so locals in Kyiv have been sharing their solutions for staying warm.]]></summary>
  <category term="World"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:75526772</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Venezuela: Trump meets Machado as US seizes oil tanker]]></title>
  <updated>2026-01-15T18:21:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-01-15T18:21:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/venezuela-trump-meets-machado-as-us-seizes-oil-tanker/a-75526772?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[US forces in the Caribbean have seized a 6th sacntioned oil tanker with ties to Venezuela as sidelined opposition leader Maria Corina Machado is visiting the White House.]]></summary>
  <category term="News"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:75525640</id>
  <title><![CDATA[South Africa braces for more rain as Kruger National Park is evacuated due to deadly flooding]]></title>
  <updated>2026-01-15T18:12:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-01-15T18:12:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/south-africa-braces-for-more-rain-as-kruger-national-park-is-evacuated-due-to-deadly-flooding/a-75525640?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[South Africa's most renowned national reserve has shut its gates amid escalating floodwaters and heavy rainfall, which has already claimed at least 19 lives.]]></summary>
  <category term="News"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:75522177</id>
  <title><![CDATA[US visa suspensions: What you need to know]]></title>
  <updated>2026-01-15T17:03:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-01-15T17:03:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/us-visa-suspensions-what-you-need-to-know/a-75522177?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[The US is suspending visa processing for 75 countries. What does this mean, when will it start and who does it affect?]]></summary>
  <category term="TOP STORIES"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:75524677</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Iran's regime crushing protests in bloody crackdown]]></title>
  <updated>2026-01-15T16:44:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-01-15T16:44:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/iran-s-regime-crushing-protests-in-bloody-crackdown/a-75524677?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[Protesters are putting their lives on the line in Iran as the state mounts a coordinated and brutal response to the unrest. As the death toll grows, hopes of outside help seem faint.]]></summary>
  <category term="World"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:75453946</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Port Assab becomes flashpoint for Ethiopia–Eritrea relations]]></title>
  <updated>2026-01-15T16:16:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-01-15T16:16:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/port-assab-becomes-flashpoint-for-ethiopia-eritrea-relations/a-75453946?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[Addis Ababa's renewed calls for sea access threaten an already fragile relationship with Eritrea, drawing anger from Asmara.]]></summary>
  <category term="World"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:75516453</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Germany: The harsh reality of cutting development aid]]></title>
  <updated>2026-01-15T15:37:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-01-15T15:37:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/germany-the-harsh-reality-of-cutting-development-aid/a-75516453?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[Germany is cutting its development aid budget. But since development policy is also part of national security, alongside diplomacy and defense, these budget cuts may cause problems.]]></summary>
  <category term="Germany"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:75522140</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Trump threatens to invoke the Insurrection Act in Minnesota]]></title>
  <updated>2026-01-15T14:27:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-01-15T14:27:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/trump-threatens-to-invoke-the-insurrection-act-in-minnesota/a-75522140?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[US President Donald Trump threatens to deploy military forces to quell protests in Minnesota, as tensions run high over the role of ICE officers in the city.]]></summary>
  <category term="News"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:75516554</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Hong Kong: Life sentence looms for media tycoon Jimmy Lai]]></title>
  <updated>2026-01-15T13:40:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-01-15T13:40:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/hong-kong-life-sentence-looms-for-media-tycoon-jimmy-lai/a-75516554?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[With the last stage of Jimmy Lai's national security trial drawing to a close, Hong Kong's High Court is set to decide on the sentence for the pro-democracy tycoon. Will Lai get life in prison?]]></summary>
  <category term="World"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:75516264</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Seoul, Tokyo watch US foreign policy twists with rising fear]]></title>
  <updated>2026-01-15T13:33:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-01-15T13:33:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/seoul-tokyo-watch-us-foreign-policy-twists-with-rising-fear/a-75516264?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[Donald Trump's hostile signals over Greenland and the aftermath of the Venezuela attack have raised fears in Japan and South Korea that Washington is no longer committed to its allies in East Asia.]]></summary>
  <category term="World"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:75517611</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Ukraine: Zelenskyy declares energy emergency in cold snap]]></title>
  <updated>2026-01-15T12:41:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-01-15T12:41:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/ukraine-zelenskyy-declares-energy-emergency-in-cold-snap/live-75517611?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[Ukraine's president declared an emergency in the energy sector amid freezing weather and Russian strikes on infrastructure. Meanwhile, Donald Trump blamed Kyiv for the lack of peace talk progress. Follow DW for more.]]></summary>
  <category term="News"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:75513790</id>
  <title><![CDATA['Charlie Hebdo' cartoon on Swiss fire tragedy sparks outrage]]></title>
  <updated>2026-01-15T11:35:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-01-15T11:35:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/charlie-hebdo-cartoon-on-swiss-fire-tragedy-sparks-outrage/a-75513790?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[A cartoon by the French satirical weekly portraying the deadly fire in Crans-Montana as the "comedy of the year" provokes disgust.]]></summary>
  <category term="Culture"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:75517587</id>
  <title><![CDATA[ISS crew returns to Earth in first-ever medical evacuation]]></title>
  <updated>2026-01-15T11:35:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-01-15T11:35:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/iss-crew-returns-to-earth-in-first-ever-medical-evacuation/a-75517587?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[For the first time in the International Space Station's history, NASA safely returned a crew of four astronauts to Earth ahead of schedule due to medical issues affecting one of the group.]]></summary>
  <category term="News"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:75514480</id>
  <title><![CDATA[German military personnel set to arrive in Greenland]]></title>
  <updated>2026-01-15T09:51:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-01-15T09:51:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/german-military-personnel-set-to-arrive-in-greenland/a-75514480?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[Germany said that the European mission in Greenland was there to counter "threats" from Russia and China. The German team is among the groups of European military personnel who are scheduled to arrive in Greenland.]]></summary>
  <category term="News"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:75506901</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Women poised to take India sports to the next level]]></title>
  <updated>2026-01-15T09:45:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-01-15T09:45:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/women-poised-to-take-india-sports-to-the-next-level/a-75506901?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[India has been experiencing major growth in women's sports in recent years. This is being fuelled by investment from both the public and private sector – as well as many role models.]]></summary>
  <category term="Sports"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:75513024</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Germany news: Economy narrowly avoids 3rd year of recession]]></title>
  <updated>2026-01-15T09:43:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-01-15T09:43:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/germany-news-economy-narrowly-avoids-3rd-year-of-recession/live-75513024?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[Germany's GDP grew 0.2% in 2025, ending a run of two consecutive years of recession, new figures show. The justice minister wants to combat the misuse of AI to create sexualized images. DW has more]]></summary>
  <category term="News"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:75511404</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Iran updates: Trump holds off on strikes after assurances]]></title>
  <updated>2026-01-15T07:22:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-01-15T07:22:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/iran-updates-trump-holds-off-on-strikes-after-assurances/live-75511404?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[US President Donald Trump says Iran has halted killings and executions, citing assurances he received. Tehran denies plans for hangings as tensions remain high and airspace closures disrupt flights. Follow DW for more.]]></summary>
  <category term="News"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:75511408</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Tense Uganda goes to vote amid internet blackout]]></title>
  <updated>2026-01-15T06:23:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-01-15T06:23:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/tense-uganda-goes-to-vote-amid-internet-blackout/a-75511408?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[Ugandans lined up outside polling stations and encountered delays amid technical difficulties, after a repressive campaign saw hundreds of supporters of President Museveni's opponent arrested.]]></summary>
  <category term="News"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:75511331</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Musk's xAI curbs sexually explicit image generation in Grok]]></title>
  <updated>2026-01-15T05:02:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-01-15T05:02:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/musk-s-xai-curbs-sexually-explicit-image-generation-in-grok/a-75511331?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[xAI has announced measures to rein in Grok's 'Spicy Mode' after global backlash over AI-edited images undressing women and children.]]></summary>
  <category term="News"/>
 </entry>
 <entry>
  <id>tag:dw.com,2026:75511317</id>
  <title><![CDATA[Minneapolis: Officer shoots person in leg during arrest]]></title>
  <updated>2026-01-15T04:49:00Z</updated>
  <published>2026-01-15T04:49:00Z</published>
  <rights>2026 DW</rights>
  <link rel="alternate" hreflang="en" href="https://www.dw.com/en/minneapolis-officer-shoots-person-in-leg-during-arrest/a-75511317?maca=en-rss-en-top-1022-xml-atom"/>
  <summary><![CDATA[An officer was allegedly attacked with a shovel and broom handle while trying to arrest the person, DHS said. The shooting took place a few kilometers from where an immigration agent fatally shot Renee Good.]]></summary>
  <category term="News"/>
 </entry>
</feed>
